activities: We are an omni-channel ecommerce solutions provider that provides services to our clients that send electronic messages.  We offer a number of solutions to manage customers’ life cycles, including acquisition, engagement, shopping cart recovery, post-purchase, re-engagement, product recommendation and social and mobile strategies.  The Listrak application provides a platform for our customers to support email creation, technology support for hosting the email subscription process, data hosting, email delivery, tracking results of email campaigns, analysis of data, and transferring collected data back to the client.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: on-line and off-line - includes manually processed data
privacyprograms:
TRUSTe
Online Trust Alliance
International Association of Privacy Professionals
recoursemech: We provide an option for individuals to contact a third party (TRUSTe) for dispute resolution via a link in our privacy policy.  For organizational human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
